original_text: If your hand causes you to do wrong things, you should cut it off. You will only have one hand, but you can have God's true life. It will be much worse for you if you keep both your hands and go to hell. There, the fire always burns and never stops. 45-

sentences.original_text: If your hand causes you to do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신의 손이 당신이 잘못된 일을 하게 만든다면

sentences.original_text: You will only have one hand
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 손 하나만 갖게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: but you can have God's true life
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 하나님의 참된 생명을 가질 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: It will be much worse for you
if you keep both your hands
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 두 손을 모두 간직한다면
